mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fdcs_sys_dictionary_content ( dicPath, string1, string2, string3, string4, zs1, zs2, zs3, zs4, intro1, intro2, content, orderIndex, createTime) VALUES ( #{dicPath}, #{string1}, #{string2}, #{string3}, #{string4}, #{zs1}, #{zs2}, #{zs3}, #{zs4}, #{intro1}, #{intro2}, #{content}, #{orderIndex}, #{createTime} )
